verses.verse: My son <S%H1121><s%>, if thou wilt receive <S%H3947><s%> my words <S%H561><s%>, And lay <S%H6845><s%> up my commandments with thee <S%H4687><s%>;
So as to incline <S%H7181><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> unto wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, And apply <S%H5186><s%> thy heart <S%H3820><s%> to understanding <S%H8394><s%>;
Yea <S%H7121><s%>, if thou cry after discernment <S%H998><s%>, And lift up <S%H5414><s%> thy voice <S%H6963><s%> for understanding <S%H8394><s%>;
If thou seek <S%H1245><s%> her as silver <S%H3701><s%>, And search <S%H2664><s%> for her as for hid treasures <S%H4301><s%>:
Then shalt thou understand <S%H995><s%> the fear <S%H3374><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And find <S%H4672><s%> the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>; Out of his mouth <S%H6310><s%> cometh knowledge <S%H1847><s%> and understanding <S%H1847><s%>:
He layeth up <S%H6845><s%> sound wisdom <S%H8454><s%> for the upright <S%H3477><s%>; He is a shield <S%H4043><s%> to them that walk <S%H1980><s%> in integrity <S%H8537><s%>;
That he may guard <S%H5341><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of justice <S%H4941><s%>, And preserve <S%H8104><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of his saints <S%H2623><s%>.
Then shalt thou understand <S%H995><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and justice <S%H4941><s%>, And equity <S%H4339><s%>, yea <S%H2896><s%>, every good path <S%H4570><s%>.
For wisdom <S%H2451><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into thy heart <S%H3820><s%>, And knowledge <S%H1847><s%> shall be pleasant <S%H5276><s%> unto thy soul <S%H5315><s%>;
Discretion <S%H4209><s%> shall watch <S%H8104><s%> over thee <S%H8394><s%>; Understanding shall keep thee <S%H8104><s%>:
To deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee from the way <S%H1870><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%>, From the men <S%H376><s%> that speak <S%H1696><s%> perverse things <S%H8419><s%>;
Who forsake <S%H5800><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of uprightness <S%H3476><s%>, To walk <S%H3212><s%> in the ways <S%H1870><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%>;
Who rejoice <S%H8056><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>, And delight <S%H1523><s%> in the perverseness <S%H8419><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%>;
Who are crooked <S%H6141><s%> in their ways <S%H734><s%>, And wayward <S%H3868><s%> in their paths <S%H4570><s%>:
To deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee from the strange <S%H2114><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>, Even from the foreigner <S%H5237><s%> that flattereth <S%H2505><s%> with her words <S%H561><s%>;
That forsaketh <S%H5800><s%> the friend <S%H441><s%> of her youth <S%H5271><s%>, And forgetteth <S%H7911><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of her God <S%H430><s%>:
For her house <S%H1004><s%> inclineth <S%H7743><s%> unto death <S%H4194><s%>, And her paths <S%H4570><s%> unto the dead <S%H7496><s%>;
None that go <S%H935><s%> unto her return again <S%H7725><s%>, Neither do they attain <S%H5381><s%> unto the paths <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>:
That thou mayest walk <S%H3212><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of good <S%H2896><s%> men <S%H8104><s%>, And keep the paths <S%H734><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.
For the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, And the perfect <S%H8549><s%> shall remain in it <S%H3498><s%>.
But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%>, And the treacherous <S%H898><s%> shall be rooted out of it <S%H5255><s%>.
